summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 8, 1st Subdivision Washington Park Addition, from East Ward Street to East Prospect Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9140 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
